Rugby Archivers 2018 - 2019 Season

Concept

Rugby Achivers concept is based on exceptional performence including, Representing Uganda at an intetnational Tournament, This gives pride to your team, teamates and the Club when a Player is selected to the final squad. Overall Tournament Performance including Most Valuable Players(MVP),Top point scores and top Try scorer,

  • Criteria
  • Overall Tournament MVP
  • Top TRY Scorers
  • Top Point Scorers
  • National Team Cap
